page.title: 12Employment
page.content: On the outskirts of the town is alarge aluminium processing plant. The factory was built on part of the Stanley estate.The factory was built at Holyhead to take advantage of the natural deep water harbour which allowed large vessels to disembark the necessary raw materials. There has been a steady decline in production as the demand for aluminium receeds.This has had an effect on the number of people employed at the works.Voluntary redundancies have been called for of late. Also the price of power has caused production prices to rise which has prompted the company to ask for state aid.This has not materialised so far.
